Post.title: git.idea
Post._content:
1..ideaignore
```bash
$ echo '.idea' >> .gitignore
```

2.gitidea
```bash
$ git rm -r --cached .idea
```

3..gitignoregit
```bash
$ git add .gitignore
```

4..gitignore.idea
```bash
$ git commit -m '.idea'
```

5PushGit

```bash
$ git push
```

Post.title: MacGithub Pages
Post._content:
Hexo + Next + GitHubPages 

## 

### node.js

``` bash
$ brew install node
```

###  git

``` bash
$ brew install git
```

### yarn

``` bash
$ npm install yarn
```



``` bash
$ brew install yarn
```

### hexo

blog

``` bash
$ cd blog
```

 yarn  hexo

``` bash
$ yarn add hexo -S
```



``` bash
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
$ npm install hexo-server --save
```
[](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/)

## 

### 

,hexo

``` bash
$ cd blog
$ hexo init
```
### 

``` bash
$ yarn install
```
### 

``` bash
$ hexo server
```
 `localhost:4000` 

##  GitHub
### 

![](Github-Pages-Blog/create-project.png)

 `[].github.io`
![](Github-Pages-Blog/create-repository.png)

### 

![](Github-Pages-Blog/setting.png)

GitHub Pages masterchoose a theme

![github-pages](Github-Pages-Blog/github-pages.png)

select theme
![](Github-Pages-Blog/select-theme.png)

  `https://[].github.io/`,

![](Github-Pages-Blog/copy-url.png)

 `_config.yml` 

![hexogit](Github-Pages-Blog/deploy-position.png)

### 
[](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/configuration)

### 

 hexo-deployer-git 
``` bash
$ yarn add hexo-deployer-git -S
```

``` bash
$ npm install--save hexo-deployer-git
```
 hexo d -g  GitHub  git push ,sudo
``` bash
$  hexo d -g
```
github`https://[].github.io/`

## NexT
NexT Hexo 
[](https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next/blob/master/README.cn.md)

### NexT
NexT
``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next
```
`_config.yml` 
![](Github-Pages-Blog/change-theme.png)

github
``` bash
$  hexo d -g
```
github`https://[].github.io/`

### 

`themes/next``_config.yml`
next4
```yaml
# ---------------------------------------------------------------
# Scheme Settings
# ---------------------------------------------------------------

# Schemes
#scheme: Muse
scheme: Mist
#scheme: Pisces
#scheme: Gemini
```
Menu Settings
```yaml
# ---------------------------------------------------------------
# Menu Settings
# ---------------------------------------------------------------
menu:
  home: / || home
#  about: /about/ || user
  tags: /tags/ || tags
  categories: /categories/ || th
#  archives: /archives/ || archive
#  schedule: /schedule/ || calendar
#  sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap
#  commonweal: /404.html || heartbeat
```
![](Github-Pages-Blog/blog-icon.png)
[](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html#install-next-theme),[](http://shenzekun.cn/hexo%E7%9A%84next%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E4%B8%AA%E6%80%A7%E5%8C%96%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E6%95%99%E7%A8%8B.html),[](http://yearito.cn/posts/hexo-theme-beautify.html)


``` bash
$  hexo clean
$  hexo d -g
```
 `localhost:4000` 
``` bash
$ hexo server
```
## 

### 


``` bash
$ hexo new page tags
```
 source/tags  index.md 
``` markdown
title: tags
type: "tags"
comments: false
---
```
`themes/next``_config.yml`  `tags: /tags/ || tags` 

``` bash
$ hexo new 'test'
```
tags
``` markdown
title: 
tags:
  - Testing
  - Another Tag
---
```
  
![](Github-Pages-Blog/tags.png)

### 

``` bash
$ hexo new page categories
```
 source/tags  index.md 
``` markdown
title: categories
type: "categories"
comments: false
---
```
`themes/next``_config.yml`  `categories: /categories/ || th` 
categories
``` markdown
title: 
tags:
  - Testing
  - Another Tag
---
categories: Testing
```
  
![](Github-Pages-Blog/categories.png)

### 


``` bash
$ npm install hexo-asset-image --save
```

md_post
``` bash
$ hexo new ''
```
markdown
``` markdown
 ![](xxxx/.jpg)
```
xxxx

### Valine

[Leancloud](https://leancloud.cn/),
`appid``appkey`
![](Github-Pages-Blog/valine.png)

`themes/next``_config.yml`
``` yaml
 # Valine.
 # You can get your appid and appkey from https://leancloud.cn
 # more info please open https://valine.js.org
 valine:
   enable: true
   appid: your appid  # your leancloud application appid
   appkey: your appkey # your leancloud application appkey
   notify: false # mail notifier , https://github.com/xCss/Valine/wiki
   verify: false # Verification code
   placeholder:   # comment box placeholder
   avatar: monsterid # gravatar style
   guest_info: nick,mail # custom comment header
   pageSize: 10 # pagination size
```
[Leancloud](https://leancloud.cn/)
![](Github-Pages-Blog/comment-delete.png)

Post.title: JAVA
Post._content:
Javajavago

## 

### JDK
OracleJDK1.8.0_161

### GO
[GO](https://golang.org/dl/)GO,1.11.2
Go
``` bash
$ go version
go version go1.11.2 darwin/amd64
```

```bash
#Go
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
#Go,
export GOPATH=/home/XXX/XXX/jvmgo/go
```
GOPATH,
```base
$ go env
```
## JAVA

java

|  |  |
| :------ | :------ | 
| -version |  | 
| -?/-help	 |  |
| -cp/-classpath |  |
| -Dproperty=value | Java |
| -Xms |  |
| -Xmx |  |
| -Xss |  |

### 


```base
|-jvmgo
    |-ch01
```
ch01cmd.go
```go
package main

import "flag"
import "fmt"
import "os"


//: java [-options] class [args...] ()
//  java [-options] -jar jarfile [args...] ( jar )
type Cmd struct {
	helpFlag bool
	versionFlag bool
	cpOption string
	class string
	args []string
}


//
func printUsage()  {
	fmt.Printf("Usage%s [-options] class [args...]\n",os.Args[0])
}

//
func parseCmd() *Cmd {
	
	//cmdCmd
	cmd := &Cmd{}

	//flag
	//Usage
	flag.Usage = printUsage
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.helpFlag,"help",false,"print help message")
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.helpFlag,"?",false,"print help message")
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.versionFlag,"version",false,"print version and exit")
	flag.StringVar(&cmd.cpOption,"classpath","","classpath")
	flag.StringVar(&cmd.cpOption,"cp","","classpath")
	//flagflag.Parse()
	flag.Parse()
	//flag.Args()
	args := flag.Args()
	if len(args) > 0{
		cmd.class = args[0]
		cmd.args = args[1:]
	}

	return cmd
}

```
### 

ch01main.go
```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	cmd := parseCmd()
	if cmd.versionFlag {
		fmt.Println("version 0.0.1")
	}else if cmd.helpFlag || cmd.class == ""{
		printUsage()
	}else {
		startJVM(cmd)
	}
}
//jvm
func startJVM(cmd *Cmd)  {
	//
	fmt.Printf("classpath:%s class:%s args:%v\n",cmd.cpOption,cmd.class,cmd.args)
}
```

main.go-version
```bash
$ go install jvmgo/ch01 
$ ch01 -version
version 0.0.1
```


ch01cmd.go
```go
package main

import "flag"
import "fmt"
import "os"


//: java [-options] class [args...] ()
//  java [-options] -jar jarfile [args...] ( jar )
type Cmd struct {
	helpFlag bool
	versionFlag bool
	cpOption string
	class string
	args []string
}


//
func printUsage()  {
	fmt.Printf("Usage%s [-options] class [args...]\n",os.Args[0])
}

//
func parseCmd() *Cmd {
	
	//cmdCmd
	cmd := &Cmd{}

	//flag
	//Usage
	flag.Usage = printUsage
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.helpFlag,"help",false,"print help message")
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.helpFlag,"?",false,"print help message")
	flag.BoolVar(&cmd.versionFlag,"version",false,"print version and exit")
	flag.StringVar(&cmd.cpOption,"classpath","","classpath")
	flag.StringVar(&cmd.cpOption,"cp","","classpath")
	//flagflag.Parse()
	flag.Parse()
	//flag.Args()
	args := flag.Args()
	if len(args) > 0{
		cmd.class = args[0]
		cmd.args = args[1:]
	}

	return cmd
}

```
### 

ch01main.go
```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	cmd := parseCmd()
	if cmd.versionFlag {
		fmt.Println("version 0.0.1")
	}else if cmd.helpFlag || cmd.class == ""{
		printUsage()
	}else {
		startJVM(cmd)
	}
}
//jvm
func startJVM(cmd *Cmd)  {
	//
	fmt.Printf("classpath:%s class:%s args:%v\n",cmd.cpOption,cmd.class,cmd.args)
}
```

```bash
$ go install jvmgo/ch01 
$ ch01 -version
```

javaCClass
```java
ClassFile {
     u4             magic;//
     u2             minor_version;//
     u2             major_version;//
     u2             constant_pool_count;//
     cp_info        constant_pool[constant_pool_count-1];//
     u2             access_flags;//
     u2             this_class;//
     u2             super_class;//
     u2             interfaces_count;//
     u2             interfaces[interfaces_count];//
     u2             fields_count;//
     field_info     fields[fields_count];//
     u2             methods_count;//
     method_info    methods[methods_count];//
     u2             attributes_count;//
     attribute_info attributes[attributes_count];//
}
```
### 

ch02ch03ch03classfile
```base
|-jvmgo
    |-ch01
    |-ch01
    |-ch03
        |-classfile
        |-classpath
        |-cmd.go
        |-main.go
```
classclassFileTest.java
```java
public class ClassFileTest {
    public static final boolean FLAG = true;
    public static final byte BYTE = 123;
    public static final char X = 'X';
    public static final short SHORT = 12345;
    public static final int INT = 123456789;
    public static final long LONG = 12345678901L;
    public static final float PI = 3.14f;
    public static final double E = 2.71828;
    public static void main(String[] args) throws RuntimeException {
        System.out.println("Hello, World!");
    }
}
```
[classpy](https://github.com/zxh0/classpy)class

#### redis?
```bash
Redis key-value
```

#### Redis
``` bash
String: set key value
Hash: hmset name  key1 value1 key2 value2
Listlpush  name  value
Setsadd  name  value
zset(sorted set) zadd  name score value
```

```bash
Redis

    2CPU
    3
```

Post.title: Spring Boot + MyBatis
Post._content:
### #### * IDEIntelliJ IDEA 2019.1 * mac OSX #### * biz * daoMBxml * common * web ### #### 1 IDEA File -> New -> Project... ![](Project-Module/1.png) 2Spring InitializrInitializrDefaultNext ![](Project-Module/2.png) 3,Next ![](Project-Module/3.png) 4Next ![](Project-Module/4.png) 5nameFinish ![](Project-Module/5.png) 6 ![](Project-Module/6.png) 7 ![](Project-Module/7.png) #### 8,->New -> Module ![](Project-Module/8.png) 9MavenNext ![](Project-Module/9.png) 10ArifactIdNext ![](Project-Module/10.png) 11Finish ![](Project-Module/11.png) 12 ![](Project-Module/12.png) #### * bizdaocommon * dao * common * webbizcommon 13pom ```xml com.example.test biz ${project.version} com.example.test common ${project.version} com.example.test dao ${project.version} com.example.test web ${project.version} ``` 14bizpomdaocommon ```xml com.example.test dao com.example.test common ``` 15webpombizcommon ```xml com.example.test biz com.example.test common ``` #### 16webpomspring-boot-starter-web ```xml org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-web ``` 17webcom.example.test.demo.webAppServiceApplication.java ![](Project-Module/17.png) ```java package com.example.test.demo.web; import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication; import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication; @SpringBootApplication public class AppServiceApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(AppServiceApplication.class, args); } } ``` 18com.example.test.demo.webcontrollertest ```java package com.example.test.demo.web.controller; import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping; import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController; @RestController @RequestMapping("demo") public class DemoController { @RequestMapping("test") public String test() { return "Hello World!"; } } ``` 19AppServiceApplicationmain8080http://localhost:8080/demo/test ![](Project-Module/19.png) 20bizcom.example.test.demo.bizDemoService ```java package com.example.test.demo.biz; public interface DemoService { String test(); } ``` 21com.example.test.demo.bizimplDemoServiceImpl ```java package com.example.test.demo.biz.impl; import com.example.test.demo.biz.DemoService; import org.springframework.stereotype.Service; @Service public class DemoServiceImpl implements DemoService { @Override public String test() { return "biz test"; } } ``` 22DemoController@AutowiredDemoServiceDemoControllertest ```java package com.example.test.demo.web.controller; import com.example.test.demo.biz.DemoService; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired; import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping; import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController; @RestController @RequestMapping("demo") public class DemoController { @Autowired private DemoService demoService; @RequestMapping("test") public String test() { return demoService.test(); } } ``` 23AppServiceApplication@ComponentScan ```java package com.example.test.demo.web; import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication; import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication; import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan; @SpringBootApplication @ComponentScan(basePackages = { "com.example.test.demo.*" }) public class AppServiceApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(AppServiceApplication.class, args); } } ``` 24mainhttp://localhost:8080/demo/test ![](Project-Module/24.png) 25 #### Mybatis 26pommybatis-spring-boot-startermysql-connector-java ```xml 4.0.0 pom biz dao common web org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 2.1.2.RELEASE com.example.test demo 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT demo Demo project for Spring Boot 1.8 8.0.11 1.3.2 1.3.2 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-maven-plugin ${mybatis.generator.version} mysql mysql-connector-java ${mysql-connector.version} org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-core ${mybatis.generator.version} src/main/resources true com.example.test biz ${project.version} com.example.test common ${project.version} com.example.test dao ${project.version} com.example.test web ${project.version} org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-test test org.mybatis.spring.boot mybatis-spring-boot-starter ${mybatis.version} mysql mysql-connector-java ${mysql-connector.version} ``` 27daopom ```xml org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-maven-plugin ${basedir}/src/main/resources/mybatis-generator.xml true true ``` 28web/src/main/resourcesapplication.properties * **com.mysql.jdbc.Driver** mysql-connector-java 5 * **com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver** mysql-connector-java 6 ```properties spring.datasource.driverClassName = com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver spring.datasource.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF8&connectTimeout=1000&socketTimeout=3000 spring.datasource.username = root spring.datasource.password = qwertyui mybatis.type-aliases-package = com.example.test.demo.dao.po mybatis.mapper-locations = classpath:mapper/*.xml ``` 29web/src/main/resourcesmybatis-generator.xml ```xml
``` 30Mapperpo, ![](Project-Module/30.1.png) ![](Project-Module/30.2.png) 30bizDemoServiceImpl@AutowiredUserMapperDemoServicetest ```java package com.example.test.demo.biz.impl; import com.example.test.demo.biz.DemoService; import com.example.test.demo.dao.mapper.UserInfoPOMapper; import com.example.test.demo.dao.po.UserInfoPO; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired; import org.springframework.stereotype.Service; @Service public class DemoServiceImpl implements DemoService { @Autowired private UserInfoPOMapper userInfoPOMapper; @Override public String test() { UserInfoPO po = userInfoPOMapper.selectByPrimaryKey(1L); return "UserInfo name is:" + po.getName(); } } ``` 31AppServiceApplication ```java @MapperScan("com.example.test.demo.dao.mapper") ``` 32main ![](Project-Module/32.png) ### mybatis > Client does not support authentication protocol requested by server; consider upgrading MySQL client mysql ```bash ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'qwertyui'; SELECT plugin FROM mysql.user WHERE User = 'root'; ```

@RestController @RequestMapping("demo") public class DemoController { @Autowired private DemoService demoService; @RequestMapping("test") public String test() { return demoService.test(); } } ``` 23AppServiceApplication@ComponentScan ```java package com.example.test.demo.web; import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication; import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication; import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan; @SpringBootApplication @ComponentScan(basePackages = { "com.example.test.demo.*" }) public class AppServiceApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(AppServiceApplication.class, args); } } ``` 24mainhttp://localhost:8080/demo/test ![](Project-Module/24.png) 25 #### Mybatis 26pommybatis-spring-boot-startermysql-connector-java ```xml 4.0.0 pom biz dao common web org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 2.1.2.RELEASE com.example.test demo 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT demo Demo project for Spring Boot 1.8 8.0.11 1.3.2 1.3.2 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-maven-plugin ${mybatis.generator.version} mysql mysql-connector-java ${mysql-connector.version} org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-core ${mybatis.generator.version} src/main/resources true com.example.test biz ${project.version} com.example.test common ${project.version} com.example.test dao ${project.version} com.example.test web ${project.version} org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-test test org.mybatis.spring.boot mybatis-spring-boot-starter ${mybatis.version} mysql mysql-connector-java ${mysql-connector.version} ``` 27daopom ```xml org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-maven-plugin ${basedir}/src/main/resources/mybatis-generator.xml true true ``` 28web/src/main/resourcesapplication.properties * **com.mysql.jdbc.Driver** mysql-connector-java 5 * **com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver** mysql-connector-java 6 ```properties spring.datasource.driverClassName = com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver spring.datasource.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF8&connectTimeout=1000&socketTimeout=3000 spring.datasource.username = root spring.datasource.password = qwertyui mybatis.type-aliases-package = com.example.test.demo.dao.po mybatis.mapper-locations = classpath:mapper/*.xml ``` 29web/src/main/resourcesmybatis-generator.xml ```xml
``` 30Mapperpo, ![](Project-Module/30.1.png) ![](Project-Module/30.2.png) 30bizDemoServiceImpl@AutowiredUserMapperDemoServicetest ```java package com.example.test.demo.biz.impl; import com.example.test.demo.biz.DemoService; import com.example.test.demo.dao.mapper.UserInfoPOMapper; import com.example.test.demo.dao.po.UserInfoPO; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired; import org.springframework.stereotype.Service; @Service public class DemoServiceImpl implements DemoService { @Autowired private UserInfoPOMapper userInfoPOMapper; @Override public String test() { UserInfoPO po = userInfoPOMapper.selectByPrimaryKey(1L); return "UserInfo name is:" + po.getName(); } } ``` 31AppServiceApplication ```java @MapperScan("com.example.test.demo.dao.mapper") ``` 32main ![](Project-Module/32.png) ### mybatis > Client does not support authentication protocol requested by server; consider upgrading MySQL client mysql ```bash ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'qwertyui'; SELECT plugin FROM mysql.user WHERE User = 'root'; ```
